definition: conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm, something regarded as a normative example
details:
adjective
- conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm
= example: conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm
- being approximately average or within certain limits in e.g. intelligence and development
= example: being approximately average or within certain limits in e.g. intelligence and development
- in accordance with scientific laws
- forming a right angle
noun
- something regarded as a normative example
= synonyms: pattern
